column1: Little Goat Diner////As others have mentioned
column2: one thing that can't be disputed are the prices; I thought everything was pretty fair for the portion size and I think only one item on the food menu was more than $20
column3: so it's got that going for it. Â The space is cool
column5: and if you don't like waiting in line
column6: the hours allow for getting creative by showing up during off-peak times to slide right in.
